column1: #Text=Main Aang Appa Bumi Katara Momo Sokka Antagonists Azula Mai Ty Lee says : " Minor Flopsie Lo and Li Michi Shuzumu Tom - Tom Ukano Yung " Avatar Roku says : " Previously on Avatar ... " Katara says : " You 're looking at the only waterbender in the whole South Pole .
#Text=Our ancestor saw how it pushed and pulled the tides , and learned how to do it themselves .
#Text=" Katara says : " I always noticed my waterbending is stronger at night .
#Text=" Toph says : " What are you doing ?
